title: 186 or 485?
content:
Interesting article about color perception, titled "Is my red your red?"

[http://www.world-science.net/exclusives/050526\_colorfrm.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20130529080759/http:/www.world-science.net/exclusives/050526_colorfrm.htm "http://www.world-science.net/exclusives/050526\_colorfrm.htm")

The chart is interesting, since I didn't agree with most of the average "best representation" dots of each color. It was done in '72, maybe that's why.

My norms, based on my monitor: Red - up one from shown dot. Orange - down a square. Blue & Yellow - one to the right.
author: Brian_
